result.geographic_coverage: 111100: United Kingdom (England, Scotland, Wales, Northern Ireland)
result.name: cap-uk-payments-2009
result.notes:
Amounts received by UK beneficiaries under the Common Agricultural Policy (CAP). The information is published annually (30th April) to meet the requirements of Commission Regulation (EC) No 259/2008.  The details included relate to all CAP scheme payments, including the Single Payment Scheme (SPS), made to beneficiaries.  In the UK there are 4 accredited Paying Agencies: the Rural Payments Agency (RPA), the Scottish Government Rural Payments & Inspections Directorate (SGRPID), the Welsh Assembly Government (WAG) and the Department of Agriculture and Rural Development (DARD) in Northern Ireland.

These bodies may delegate certain functions to other bodies, but are responsible for accounting for all payments under CAP schemes. Search results show which Paying Agency has responsibility for the payments.

odi-certificate.title: CAP Scheme Payments including the Single Payment Scheme (SPS) made to UK beneficiaries 2009

organization.name: department-for-environment-food-and-rural-affairs
organization.title: Department for Environment, Food and Rural Affairs
organization.description:
We are the UK government department responsible for policy and regulations on environmental, food and rural issues. Our priorities are to grow the rural economy, improve the environment and safeguard animal and plant health.

Defra is a ministerial department, supported by 38 agencies and public bodies.

https://www.gov.uk/government/organisations/department-for-environment-food-rural-affairs

result.precision: The details included relate to all CAP scheme payments, including the Single Payment Scheme (SPS), made to beneficiaries during the year 16 October to 15 October for the year in question.  This means any payment they received between these dates, for all the schemes, will be included and the amounts may not take account of any subsequent changes or adjustments made to payments.
result.title: CAP Scheme Payments including the Single Payment Scheme (SPS) made to UK beneficiaries 2009
